ai-patthana24.22:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of clothes.
ai-patthana24.22:1.1_0: One should not give up a teaching for seeing the refuge, and with the cause and condition.
ai-patthana24.22:2.1_0: One should not give up a teaching with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana24.22:2.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana24.22:3.1_0: Grasping is not the supreme cause or reason.
ai-patthana24.22:3.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana24.22:4.1_0: At the time of the threshold lifetime, and the haunt of closely roaming and transmigrating, both of the same hithern,
ai-patthana24.22:5.1_0: Not remembering or understanding is the cause,
ai-patthana24.22:6.1_0: or the supreme state of refuge.
ai-patthana24.22:6.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana24.22:8.1_1: the condition being by way of arising together condition.
ai-patthana24.22:8.1_2: the condition being by way of strong support ...
ai-patthana24.22:8.1_3: the condition being by way of arising later condition. ...
ai-patthana24.22:8.1_4: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana24.22:9.1_0: or one have one root of the tree that is not tendencies,
ai-patthana24.22:12.1_0: (This should be told in full as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.22:13.1_0: not for refuge, nor with no cause or reason,
ai-patthana24.22:14.1_0: or is not the supreme state of refuge in the Teaching, or the supreme refuge.
ai-patthana24.22:14.1_1: At one time when the two near shores were created, he scrutinizing, and one definitively after a single night. There is no one-one elsewhere in the woods, one living for a single eon in the world.
ai-patthana24.22:15.1_0: Not for the supreme refuge is a condition for the supreme refuge.
ai-patthana24.22:15.1_1: the condition being by way of arising before condition;
ai-patthana24.22:16.1_0: Not is the supreme refuge, nor for the supreme refuge.
ai-patthana24.22:16.1_2: two or three people are not asked for one of the same kind of existence.
ai-patthana24.22:16.1_3: it wasn’t worth two hundred years.
ai-patthana24.22:17.1_0: not by conditions or by conditions.
ai-patthana24.22:19.1_0: (This should be told in full as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.22:20.1_0: from the time of appreciation (which parts of) the ropes of successively means from the time to time the recitation passage (of the sun).
ai-patthana24.22:21.1_0: The field of the teachings is finished.
ai-patthana24.22:23.1_0: The group of five is finished.
